alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Monroe County through 530 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Aberdeen. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Hatley, Binford, East Aberdeen and Becker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
